ovdesc.p: This file contains the calculation details for Portfolios included in composites
It's structure is : 1 record per composite, per month and portfolio.
This file is monthly updated by a batch job called AM.COMP.HIST.DET.UPD and is used for composite reporting.
See also files : AM.COMPOSITE.HIST, AM.COMPOSITE.HIST.EXCL and AM.COMPOSITE.YEARLY.HIST

desc.p: This is the portfolios weighted monthly performance based on the modified dietz calculation method, in relationship to the composite it is attached too. The weighting used is the PORT.W.BEGIN.MONTH figure.
This is the monthly performance of the portfolio using the modified dietz calculation method.
This is the monthly performance of the portfolio using the daily calculation method.

This is the weight of this portfolio in the composite. It is based on its market value at the start of the composite calculation period against the total market value of all the portfolios included in the composite.

This field contains the portfoilio's weighted monthly performance based on the daily calculation method on gross figures. The weighting used is the Port.W.Beg.Month value.

The detailed beginning market value is the market value for the portfolio detailed in the PORTFOLIO_ID, based on the reference currency of the portfolio on the 1st day of the month for which the composite performance calculation is being made.

The total end market value is the portfolio market value of the portfolio detailed in the PORTFOLIO.ID, based on the reference currency of the portfolio on the final day of the month for which the composite performance calculation is being made.
This field contains the portfolio's weighted monthly performance based on the Modified Dietz calculation method on gross figures. The weighting used is the Port.W.Beg.Month value.
This field contains the monthly performance of the portfolio using the daily calculation method on gross figures. The formula used is :
P.Daily.Perf = Sum of P.Perf.End.Day taken from all the multivalue set of a Sc.Perf.Detail record.
